body: Characters charteix wrestia x romio please

@wings1942 thanks for your response. That's what I thought happened from what I could piece together from the comments on Google translate. God speed someone will upload the original ...Or perhaps I could purchase a copy on melonbooks via a package forwarder, but it'll be expensive. But hey, If I can expose a chink online whilst doing it, I'll do it, and I'll scan and upload the original while I'm at it.

@2cooked4you That guy in e-hentai ("塔布里斯") didn't "translate", he's no translator. He simply just imagine or guess the meaning of the text, and also never release the original JPN source in case anyone ever want to check his works ever again. 

That's the reason why he got attacked by fellow Chinese readers and have only 0.5 star on e-hentai. Therefore, for his wrongdoings, I strongly recommend not translate this into ENG by using this. We can only hope someone else have the original source and are willing to share.
I want English translation

I was planning on translating this doujin once scans of it came out... However, for whatever reason only the Chinese fan rewrite (this one) is available online. 

Furthermore, the original e-hentai submission for this rewrite is averaging at 0.5/5 stars suggesting the guy that did this rewrite kinda fucked it up? I wouldn't have a clue, I don't speak Chinese.

Char hime pls, Chartreux westia.
